about.title: About
about.subtitle: Born from a vision: bridging Senegal's digital gap with world-class solutions

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Intello was born in 2025 from a frustration: seeing dynamic Senegalese companies held back by obsolete websites and outdated digital tools.
story.p2: Founded by Patrick Junior Samba Ntadi, a Software Engineering graduate from ISM Digital Campus, Intello transforms this frustration into opportunity. After years of freelance experience on e-commerce and SaaS projects, one thing became clear: the digital gap between Senegal and international markets is huge, but bridgeable.
story.p3: Our mission is simple: give African businesses the digital tools they deserve to compete globally. No "good enough" websites. No compromises on quality. Just excellence, accessible locally.

founder.title: Founder
founder.name: Patrick Junior Samba Ntadi
founder.bio1: Graduate in Software Engineering, Networks and Systems from ISM Digital Campus (2022), Patrick has several years of experience in web and mobile development.
founder.bio2: Specialized in e-commerce and SaaS projects, he has developed sharp expertise in the modern technologies that power today's web.
founder.bio3: His vision: propel the digital transformation of Senegalese businesses with international-level solutions.
